sources.description: Five German nuns on a remote farm in the American Southwest persuade a traveling Black Baptist to build them a chapel free of charge.. A lighthearted comedy that only touches on its religious themes superficially, but thanks to the good lead actor, conveys a sense of tolerance and openness to human problems.

metadata.Plot: Homer Smith, an unemployed construction worker heading out west, stops at a remote farm in the desert to get water when his car overheats. The farm is being worked by a group of East European Catholic nuns, headed by the strict Mother Maria, who believes that Homer has been sent by God to build a much-needed church in the desert...
metadata.Actors: Sidney Poitier, Lilia Skala, Lisa Mann
